articles.title: First 20 Changi Airport COVID-19 cases from zone that receive arrivals from higher-risk countries: Ong Ye Kung - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: About 20 COVID-19 cases at Changi Airport were "quite congregated" around one zone - an area that receives travellers from higher-risk regions, including South Asia, said Transport Minister Ong Ye Kung on Friday (May 14).
